name: Arcade Racer (AlbinoGG)
description:
Arcade Racer is an isometric racing game prototype inspired by  old classics such as Rock 'n Roll Racing. I created it to showcase my work as a game developer and designer. 

It was entirely made with pre-made licensed assets, with the exception of programming and desing which were made by me. I hope you enjoy this short prototype, you can comment on the page or contact me if you want to share your opinion!

Thank you,

Ramon Albino.

___________________________________________________________________________________

Important Notes:

- Keyboard+Gamepad: Only Player 1 can use keyboard, other players need to use a gamepad in order to play.

- Gamepad: Dualshock users need to use a pad emulator (e.g.: DS4 Windows). Other gamepads should work just fine.
